text: 3.14: Zo 5.24; 1 Zo 2.9-11Nza khueŋ kaŋgi, nza won ndavir wo phorgap Zisas khothɨgi gumgi ga ndɨɨav, nza kaŋgi, nza vhɨzgi tuav thagi. Nza zazera mbara muuŋgip kɨrga bɨɨŋbɨɨŋ ndirga tuav, nza anan ki. Guma ndavar wo phorga guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi ga ndɨɨi fhu, ana rɨɨv, za rimgiap, za vhɨzi tuavar ki.
